s.text: Profiles chalk up the brothers' success to 1) good looks and 2) on-screen intensity.
Profiles chalk up the brothers' success to 1) good looks and 2) on-screen intensity.
Profiles chalk up the brothers' success to 1) good looks and 2) on-screen intensity.
Last year, he starred with Anthony Hopkins in David Mamet's The Edge . Daniel (37) is derisively referred to as the "TV Baldwin."
The Baldwin matriarch, Carol, sometimes refers to herself in interviews as Rose.
Alec makes news with his caustic condemnations: He called Newt Gingrich "evil" and Alfonse D'Amato "the bozo pool attendant from Island Park."
Alec makes news with his caustic condemnations: He called Newt Gingrich "evil" and Alfonse D'Amato "the bozo pool attendant from Island Park."
Many note similarities in their sinuous, full lips; dimpled chins; and "intense eyes."
(Billy is said to be the family peacemaker.)
(Billy is said to be the family peacemaker.)
(Billy is said to be the family peacemaker.)
(Billy is said to be the family peacemaker.)
Billy and Daniel say they both got into acting after they saw how easy it was for their brothers to make it.

Because they are Irish-Catholic, tightknit, and play touch football, the Baldwins constantly compare themselves to the Kennedys . It is a Baldwin commonplace to say that either Alec or Billy will become president.
